Production: New Line Cinema, GGR, Zupnik Cinema Group II
Plot: The real story behind the world of sales. This is a realistic portrayal of what it is to try making a life in high pressure sales with all its highs and lows; promises of fortunes and deliveries of dross. Red-leads and dead-leads are to blame for life's outcomes. Living with "Objection, Rebuttal, Close".
Title: Glengarry Glen Ross
Actors: Al Pacino, Jack Lemmon, Alec Baldwin, Alan Arkin
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 12 nominations.
Writer: David Mamet (based on the play by), David Mamet (screenplay by)
